name.ja: クリアー・ファントム

text.en: You can discard 2 cards, including this card; add 2 cards from your Deck to your hand that are either "Clear World" and/or Spells/Traps that mention it. You can only use this effect of "Clear Phantom" once per turn. You are unaffected by the effects of "Clear World". If this card is destroyed: You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy it, and if you do, send the top 3 cards of their Deck to the GY.
